edge: Ron Underwood was dissatisfied with the results of the film as he was shooting it because he knew that they didn't have the kind of wit and fun that he would want...But it wasn't very obvious how to correct it.
I felt that it was not really working fully...
But it wasn't very obvious how to correct it. [He] enjoyed working with Eddie Murphy,
Murphy 'wasn't feeling that funny, I don't think.'
Praised the talents of the cast and crew and said that he enjoyed working with Eddie Murphy,
